name: MATCH
description:
Take a cannon and a shield and prove your superiority. Sneak up behind others, stage a bloodbath, and defend your positions.

MATCH is a multiplayer person-vs-person shooter made in the best traditions of classic FPS.

Key features include:
  • Four types of weapon (blade, pistol, rifle, railgun)
  • Health and armor packs
  • Several different levels designed for intense deathmatch
  • Up to 16 players supported for one deathmatch

Invite your friend and prove that you are a true warrior.
